org.fit.cssbox.css
Class DOMAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  org.fit.cssbox.css.DOMAnalyzer

public class DOMAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements methods for the DOM tree style analysis.

Author:
burgetr

DOMAnalyzer

public DOMAnalyzer(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
Creates a new DOM analyzer.

Parameters:
doc - the document to be analyzed

DOMAnalyzer

public DOMAnalyzer(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                   java.net.URL baseUrl)
Creates a new DOM analyzer.

Parameters:
doc - the document to be analyzed
baseUrl - the base URL for loading the style sheets
Method Detail

getHead

public org.w3c.dom.Element getHead()
Returns the <head> element.

getBody

public org.w3c.dom.Element getBody()
Returns the <body> element.

printTagTree

public void printTagTree(java.io.PrintStream out)
Formats the tag tree to an output stream. This is used mainly for debugging purposes.

stylesToDom

public void stylesToDom()
Encodes the efficient style of all the elements to their style attributes. Inheritance is not applied. This is currently not necessary for the rendering. It is practical mainly together with the printTagTree method for debugging the resulting style.

stylesToDomInherited

public void stylesToDomInherited()
Encodes the efficient style of all the elements to their style attributes while applying the inheritance. This is currently not necessary for the rendering. It is practical mainly together with the printTagTree method for debugging the resulting style.

attributesToStyles

public void attributesToStyles()
Converts the HTML presentation attributes in the document body to inline styles.

createAnonymousBoxes

public void createAnonymousBoxes()
Creates anonymous <span> elements from the text nodes which have some sibling elements

getStyleSheets

public void getStyleSheets()
Returns a vector of CSSStyleSheet objects referenced from the document. The internal style sheets are read from the document directly, the external ones are downloaded and parsed automatically.

loadStyleSheet

public void loadStyleSheet(java.net.URL base,
                           java.lang.String href)
Loads a stylesheet from an URL. Imports all the imported style sheets before storing it.

Parameters:
base - the document base url
href - the href specification

addStyleSheet

public void addStyleSheet(java.net.URL base,
                          java.lang.String cssdata)
Parses and adds a style sheet represented as a string to the end of the used stylesheet lists. It imports all the imported style sheets before storing it.

Parameters:
base - the document base URL
cssdata - the style string

importStyles

public void importStyles(java.net.URL base,
                         org.w3c.dom.css.CSSStyleSheet sheet)
Scans a stylesheet and loads all the imported style sheets.

Parameters:
base - the document base URL
sheet - the style sheet to be scanned

getMatchingRules

public java.util.Vector<RuleSpec> getMatchingRules(org.w3c.dom.Element elem)
Finds all CSS rules that match the specified DOM element.

Parameters:
elem - The DOM element that is matched to the rule selectors
Returns:
a vector of matching rules

joinRules

public org.w3c.dom.css.CSSStyleDeclaration joinRules(java.util.Vector<RuleSpec> rules)
Joins multiple CSS rules to a single one.

Parameters:
rules - The vector of rules to be joined
Returns:
the resulting declaration

getElementStyle

public org.w3c.dom.css.CSSStyleDeclaration getElementStyle(org.w3c.dom.Element el)
Gets all the style declarations for a particular element and computes the resulting element style.

Parameters:
el - the element for which the style should be computed
Returns:
the resulting declaration

getElementStyleInherited

public org.w3c.dom.css.CSSStyleDeclaration getElementStyleInherited(org.w3c.dom.Element el,
                                                                    org.w3c.dom.css.CSSStyleDeclaration parent)
Get all the style declarations for a particular element and compute the resulting element style including the inheritance from a parent.

Parameters:
el - the element for which the style should be computed
parent - the parent element style from which the values are inherited
Returns:
the resulting style declaration

Creates a style declaration from the inline style of an element.

Parameters:
el - the element
Returns:
the style declaration
